amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2016. Derivative proceedings; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Derivative proceeding shall mean a civil suit or action in the right of a domestic corporation or, to the extent provided in section 21-2077, in the right of a foreign corporation; and
(2) Shareholder shall include a beneficial owner whose shares are held in a voting trust or held by a nominee on the beneficial owner's behalf.
